name: Friendzy
description:
'Friendzy' is a game about continuously adding friends . Keep up the pace or you will run out of time. But the more friends you have added the harder it will be to stay focused.

This game was made during 'Ludum Dare 40' under the theme: "The more you have, the worse it is"

Credits:

Developed by MosesG

Music: 'Relief & Freedom' by mapsynth on Newgrounds
